scripts.build-demo: yarn build && cp -r dist/my-store/assets docs/assets && yarn build-wc
scripts.build-wc: yarn build-checkout && yarn build-products-grid && yarn build-shell
scripts.build-checkout: ng build checkout --configuration production --aot --build-optimizer && cat dist/checkout/runtime.js dist/checkout/polyfills.js dist/checkout/main.js > docs/js/checkout-wc.js
scripts.build-products-grid: ng build products-grid --configuration production --aot --build-optimizer && cat dist/products-grid/runtime.js dist/products-grid/polyfills.js dist/products-grid/main.js > docs/js/products-grid-wc.js
scripts.build-shell: ng build shell --configuration production --aot --build-optimizer && cat dist/shell/runtime.js dist/shell/polyfills.js dist/shell/main.js > docs/js/shell-wc.js
